intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Riparian Zones (RZ) product, offering a detailed description of Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) classes within riparian areas. It outlines the characteristics of each LC/LU class, including geographic features, suitable input datasets, and methods for interpretation. The guideline aims to ensure consistent mapping and classification of riparian zones across the EEA-38 + UK, supporting environmental monitoring and ecosystem assessments.
